JOB DESCRIPTION: Job description           Responsibilities     Maintain and enhance existing applications in web and mobile platforms     Design Database schema, data structures and algorithms     Writing codes using JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, and CSS3, Bootstrap and other front-end frameworks     Basic understanding of Photoshop for HTML conversions     Work on MySQL Databases and Linux/Ubuntu environment     Analyze and solve performance issues by optimizing code and MySQL queries     Required Skills     Should have completed a Bachelor s degree in Technology/Computer Science     At least a year of experience in writing codes in PHP (will be an added advantage)     Ability to learn and use the PHP CodeIgniter/Laravel framework     Willingness to learn new programming languages     A grip on any flavor of Linux based OS preferable
